amendment.description: An amendment to require DOD to post on a public website the cost of the wars in Afghanistan, Iraq, and Libya, per each American taxpayer.

action.text: Mr. Young (FL) raised a point of order against the Lewis (GA) amendment (A073). Mr. Young (FL) stated that the provisions of the Lewis (GA) amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A073) offered by Mr. Lewis (GA).
